title: 11/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Mike Florio
itunes:title: 11/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Mike Florio
description:
ProFootballTalk's Mike Florio joins Dan Patrick on The Dan Patrick Show, explaining how the Browns may have structured Odell Beckham Jr's contract to help him clear waivers and why the team chose Baker Mayfield over the star wideout.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
